item.title: News Collection: Climate and Environment
item.description: This is a collection of newspaper articles related to climate and the environment, which I am interested in. Climate change Anger Builds in Towns Deliberated Flooded, in Part, to Save Beijing, NYT, Agu/4/2023, link . What This Year’s ‘Astonishing’ Ocean Heat Means for the Planet, NYT, Aug/3/2023, link . The extreme heat is devastating Floridaâ€™s coral reefs, but high ocean temperatures can have more widespread impacts, too, disrupting other marine ecosystems and the communities that depend on them.
